title: Preface: Dark Night of The Soul
description:
In episode 1 of 14 of HOW TO DO THE WORK Masterclass, Dr. Nicole LePera and Co-Host Jenna Weakland Introduce Dr. LePera’s #1 New York Times Best Seller HOW TO DO THE WORK: Recognize Your Patterns, Heal from Your Past, and Create Your Self. This is a chapter by chapter class where we dive deep into each topic. In this episode, you’ll learn about the Dark Night of the Soul, how Dr. Nicole hit her own emotional rock bottom, and how to meet your authentic self.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

PRE-ORDER HOW TO MEET YOURSELF:

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

BUY HOW TO DO THE WORK:

https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/006301209X

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012

Get my FREE Future Self Journal:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/
